channel.title: [REL]Sword.... Don't know what to name it :p
channel.description: [i][b][size=10pt]Somebody on R-S requested this sword, so I made an attempt at it. It's not perfect, but I did it to the best of my ability, the hilt looks a little bad, but it was already near 1k polys and I had to reduce some stuff. Decided to release it here and get some feedback on it. What do you guys think?[/size][/b][/i] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1835251/swifti_request.bmp[/img] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/1835252/swifti_request.rar.html]UPLOAD.EE - Download swifti_request.rar[/url]

item.title: [REL]Sword.... Don't know what to name it :p
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Im_Mad_1337:

I don’t think you guys are understanding what is clearly written in the main post. For one, about the colors, somebody requested the model by image, I followed the image as closely as possible. Second, about the detail and “ridges”, I clearly stated the sword is currently nearly 1k polys. And Raven and his comment which I (for some reason) found very insulting, I don’t need to “keep trying” I’m sure I have the concept down a lot more than you do, and I also don’t need to look at concept art to have them decide what I want to make. Hope that’s well understood now, and doesn’t need further reiteration. Thank you for those with actual constructive criticism, I’ll take that and work with it.

If you feel insulted then prove him wrong, personally i think you should have told the guy that his consept for a model sucked and should get a better one. People can get a lot better then this, and im sure you could have modelled better then this. No one knows until you show them.

Read full topic
item.source: [REL]Sword.... Don't know what to name it :p

item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

I don’t think you guys are understanding what is clearly written in the main post. For one, about the colors, somebody requested the model by image, I followed the image as closely as possible. Second, about the detail and “ridges”, I clearly stated the sword is currently nearly 1k polys. And Raven and his comment which I (for some reason) found very insulting, I don’t need to “keep trying” I’m sure I have the concept down a lot more than you do, and I also don’t need to look at concept art to have them decide what I want to make. Hope that’s well understood now, and doesn’t need further reiteration. Thank you for those with actual constructive criticism, I’ll take that and work with it.
